channel.title: Why people can't connect to my server (562)
channel.description:
Well,why people can't connect to my server?I make evrything.I changed the IP,i also make an no-ip host,download that no-ip program,im running the host and the program,running my server,evrything is ok for me,but other ppl can't join..I gave my client to my friend,and when he hit start he get in the console: ip:127.0.0.1 error_game_js5connect
And the client screen says:Runescape is loading Connecting to update server..
So please can anyone tell me what i do wrong? Im begginer at making rsps so please don't call me noob ^^
Thanks

item.title: Why people can't connect to my server (562)
item.dc:creator: @x_l0n3_r4ng3 x l0n3 r4ng3
item.description:
@x_l0n3_r4ng3 wrote:

You need to make a duplicate copy of your client and just add “LOCAL” after the name
Then on the one that doesn’t say LOCAL(your first one) Change the 127 ip to your ip(can be found here ipchicken.com) then compile(build) and send that copy to people and when your on ur computer u must play on the “LOCAL” client that has the 127 ips,
The reason this is that other people need to be able to connect to your ip so the client can verify that your source is running, I can do this for you via team viewer in like 6 hours when i wake up

Hope this helped

Read full topic
item.source: Why people can't connect to my server (562)

item.title: Why people can't connect to my server (562)
item.dc:creator: @brandonscarinfo brandonscarinfo
item.description:
@brandonscarinfo wrote:

please dont post mulitples. I responded to your other thread already. the problem is you are probably not portforwarded. you need to portforward. this site is the best way in my opinion, its step by step and guides you through it. www.portforward.com

Read full topic
